page.title: 08HOUSING IN ROSSENDALE
page.content: The{housing}in Rossendale are{terraced ,{semi detatched}and{detatched}. The favourite houses are{terraced}at 60% , {semi detatched}at 20% and{detatched}at 20% . The house in Rawtenstall are mostly {terraced}they were built when the mills were built of stone like { {terraced}houses.The houses were built of millstone grit which is quarried localy.The esates are {semi detatched} and{detached}there built of millstone grit.Millstone grit is a sandy colour but with the smoke the bricks have turned black.
